data.title: Lucky Brand Jeans at Copley Place in Boston, MA
data.meta_description: Shop for Lucky Brand quality jeans and clothing at our Copley Place location in Boston, MA. Click for directions and store details.
data.text:
Refresh Your Wardrobe at Lucky Brand in Boston

From our premium denim to an ever-changing selection of casual fashions for men, women and kids, Lucky Brand at the Copley Place Shopping Center in Boston always has something new to update your closet. Whether you're looking for a flowy maxi dress or a too-cool-for-school graphic tee, you'll find it all at our Boston, MA location. Ramp up your distinctive style with a plethora of quality handbags, jewelry and other accessories, or explore the latest pieces of clothing that are ever-evolving with the changing seasons.

Come Visit Lucky at Copley Place

Copley Place is located at 100 Huntington Avenue off Exit 133 from I-90 East, near the Prudential Center, Trinity Church, Boston Public Library and John Hancock Tower. If you're taking public transportation, you'll get off at the Dartmouth Street stop opposite Back Bay Station. When you head to our store, take the Huntington Avenue Entrance and go straight to level two once you arrive for quick and easy access to Lucky Brand.

When you visit Lucky Brand at Copley Place near Back Bay and Shawmut, you'll discover the latest apparel, accessories and more to bring a fresh and personality-infused aesthetic to your look.
